characters.name: Vincent Vega
characters.description: A hitman who is cool and charming, but also flawed and impulsive.

characters.name: Jules Winnfield
characters.description: A philosophical and imposing hitman with a penchant for quoting scripture.

characters.name: Mia Wallace
characters.description: The boss' wife, a seductive and mysterious woman with a love for dancing and cocaine.

characters.name: Butch Coolidge
characters.description: A disillusioned boxer caught in a web of dangerous situations.

characters.name: The Wolf
characters.description: A fixer known for his problem-solving skills and ability to clean up messy situations.
